entities.description: The severity of tranquilizer use disorder among past-year misusers as indicated by various levels of disorder severity.
The severity of tranquilizer use disorder among past-year users excluding misusers.
The severity of stimulant use disorder among past-year misusers as indicated by various levels of disorder severity.
The severity of stimulant use disorder among past-year users excluding misusers.
Severity level of the substance use disorder, categorized as mild, moderate, or severe.
Data derived directly from survey questionnaires.
Data that has been statistically imputed.
Responses indicating 'No past year use disorder' or legitimate skip.
The frequency or percentage of respondents with a particular response.

relationships.description: Indicates the severity level of tranquilizer use disorder.
Indicates the severity level of tranquilizer use disorder excluding misusers.
Indicates the severity level of stimulant use disorder.
Indicates the severity level of stimulant use disorder excluding misusers.
Indicates that disorder severity data is derived from questionnaire data.
Indicates that disorder severity data may be statistically imputed.
Indicates the prevalence of each level of disorder severity.
